pages.title: Cider Acid
pages.text: Composite mesh and apples compact together very well, mixing to create an acidic apple liquid. Maybe don't drink this cider!

pages.title: Acidic Powder
pages.text: Covering amber clumps with your new appular cider creates apple flavored gunpowder! $(br)Packs a punch still.

pages.title: TNT
pages.text: While its unknown if the TNT is still apple flavored, it is substantially better than your standard TNT! $(br)All blocks exploded will drop and it has a much more uniform and controlled explosion radius

pages.title: Fire Charge
pages.text: A recipe for a basic firestarter. I should also say, you don't even need to make fire charges for lighting TNT, you could just use buttons. But fire is available anyways.
